text: akave, ninkal iruvarum avanitam cenru: 'Nankaliruvarum unnutaiya iraivanin tutarkal, panu israyilkalai enkalutan anuppi vitu, melum avarkalai vetanai patuttate, titanaka, nankal un iraivanitamiruntu or attatciyai unakkuk kontu vantirukkirom, innum evar ner valiyaip pinparrukiraro avar mitu (canti) salam untavataka' enru collunkal" (enru allah kattalaiyittan)
